title: || CONDO GRADE || Downtown 5 min to Union Station LoDo RiNo LoHi SoBo
posting_body: Welcome to Riverfront / Union Station BEST Property,
Call or Text quick for Showings!
An urban living community in the heart of downtown Denver.
Denver's finest dining, tasteful nightlife, engaging art, outdoor activities and world class sports venues, and within walking distance.

Located along the riverfront, with direct walking access (UNDER 5 MINS!) to Union Station, Whole Foods, and Commons Park - less than a 10 minute walk to all the fine dining and boutique shopping near REI and in LOHI!
•18' glass wall overlooking the pool deck
•Engineered wood flooring and carpet in bedroom
•High efficiency, front loading washer and dryer included
•Pool & spa with city and mountain views
•State of the art equipment includes: treadmills, stair climbers, ellipticals, stationary bikes and f
•Two convenient building entrances at Wewatta & Delgany
